data.actual_result: The emote will appear where its name is in the URL, breaking the URL.
data.expected_result: A clickable URL with only text and no emotes in the middle of it.
data.short_description: Entering a hyperlink that contains the same text as a Twitch synced subscriber emote will render the link with the emote
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a name of one of your synced Twitch sub emotes (the ones that don't need to be used with colons). - In a text channel, or Direct Message, enter a link like "[domain dot com]/[twitch emote name] dot png", no brackets. - Observe that an emote will be placed in the URL instead of text.
